Quotes: The rose is fairest when it is budding new, and hope is brightest when it dawns from fears…
Author: Sir Walter Scott

Quotes: Amid all your duties, keep some hours to yourself…
Author: Margaret Fuller

Quotes: People spend most of their lives worrying about things that never happen…
Author: Moliere

Quotes: There is only one good thing in life, and that is love…
Author: Guy de Maupassant

Quotes: There is a woman at the beginning of all great things…
Author: Alphonse de Lamartine

Quotes: Time is the best of critics;and patience the best of teachers…
Author: Frederic Chopin

Quotes: Whoever is the most important has the best chance…
Author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Quotes: The future depends on what we do in the present…
Author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quotes: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth…
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quotes: All that is impossible remains to be accomplished…
Author: Jules Verne

Quotes: Anything becomes interesting if you look at it long enough…
Author: Gustave Flaubert

Quotes: Everything comes in time to him who knows how to wait…
Author: Leo Tolstoy

Quotes: The gift of truth excels all other gifts…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: I do not believe anything very certainly, but everything very probably…
Author: Christiaan Huygens

Quotes: I have learned more from my mistakes than from my successes…
Author: Humphry Davy

Quotes: A man who is certain he is right is almost sure to be wrong…
Author: Michael Faraday

Quotes: A man of fifty is responsible for his face…
Author: Edwin M. Stanton

Quotes: To be loved, you have to be nice to people, everyday. But to be hated, you don't have to do squat!…
Author: Homer

Quotes: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great…
Author: John D. Rockefeller

Quotes: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love…
Author: Stendhal

Quotes: fretting at trouble only doubles it…
Author: George Sand

Quotes: The believer is happy. The doubter is wise…
Author: Edgar Allan Poe

Quotes: Very little is needed to make a happy life;it is all within yourself in your way of thinking…
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Quotes: Reality is created by the mind. We can change our reality by changing our mind…
Author: Plato

Quotes: No man is your enemy, no man is your friend, every man is your teacher…
Author: Florence Scovel Shinn

Quotes: Think lovingly, speak lovingly, act lovingly, and every need shall be supplied…
Author: James Allen

Quotes: No amount of evidence will ever persuade an idiot…
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: I can't go back to yesterday - because I was a different person then…
Author: Lewis Carroll

Quotes: The only purpose of education is freedom;the only method is experience…
Author: Leo Tolstoy

Quotes: Happiness, not in another place but this place, not for another hour, but this hour…
Author: Walt Whitman

Quotes: I gave up caring about anything, and all the problems disappeared…
Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

Quotes: There are two days in the year that we can not do anything, yesterday and tomorrow…
Author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quotes: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: Fear kills more people than death…
Author: George S Patton Jr

Quotes: No man has received from nature the right to command his fellow human beings…
Author: Denis Diderot

Quotes: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character…
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open…
Author: John Barrymore

Quotes: Patriotism means to stand by the country. It does not mean to stand by the President…
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Quotes: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience this is the ideal life…
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: Nothing is more intolerable than to have admit to yourself your own errors…
Author: Ludwig van Beethoven

Quotes: You can have anything you want if you want it badly enough…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: Success is a product of unremitting attention to purpose…
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quotes: Peace cannot be kept by force;it can only be achieved by understanding…
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated…
Author: Confucius

Quotes: The trouble is not in dying for a friend, but in finding a friend worth dying for…
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: Great minds have purposes;others have wishes…
Author: Washington Irving

Quotes: The person who has stopped being thankful has fallen asleep in life…
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quotes: Anger is a momentary madness, so control your passion or it will control you…
Author: Horace

Quotes: You cannot fail unless you quit…
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quotes: Once a wolf, always a wolf…
Author: Aesop

Quotes: Where no hope is left, is left no fear…
Author: John Milton

Quotes: Vision is the art of seeing things invisible…
Author: Jonathan Swift

Quotes: Opportunity is often missed because we are broadcasting when we should be tuning in…
Author: Orison Swett Marden

Quotes: Nothing can be done except little by little…
Author: Charles Baudelaire

Quotes: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well…
Author: John D. Rockefeller

Quotes: Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk,﻿ but no flowers grow on it…
Author: Vincent van Gogh

Quotes: The goal of life is living in agreement with Nature…
Author: Zeno of Citium

Quotes: The secret to enjoying life is to take an interest in it…
Author: Thomas Troward

Quotes: Your word is your wand. The words you speak create your own destiny…
Author: Florence Scovel Shinn

Quotes: Do all the good you can and make as little fuss about it as possible…
Author: Charles Dickens

Quotes: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable…
Author: Franz Kafka

Quotes: We loiter in winter while it is already spring…
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quotes: To do nothing is the way to be nothing…
Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

Quotes: No one's fate is of any interest to you except your own…
Author: Mikhail Bulgakov

Quotes: You are not alive unless you know you are living…
Author: Amedeo Modigliani

Quotes: It is unbearably painful for the soul to love silently…
Author: Anna Akhmatova

Quotes: The goal of life is living in agreement with nature…
Author: Zeno of Elea

Quotes: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment…
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quotes: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else;you are the one who gets burned…
Author: Gautama The Lord Buddha

Quotes: Don't educate your children to be rich. Educate them to be happy, so they know the value of things, not the price…
Author: Victor Hugo

Quotes: Life is only a long and bitter suicide, and faith alone can transform this suicide into a sacrifice…
Author: Franz Liszt

Quotes: Every soul is a melody which needs renewing…
Author: Stephane Mallarme

Quotes: There is nothing more musical than a sunset…
Author: Claude Debussy

Quotes: Rule your mind or it will rule you…
Author: Horace

Quotes: Some succeed because they are destined to, but most succeed because they are determined to…
Author: Henry Van Dyke

Quotes: Learn from yesterday, live for today and hope for tomorrow…
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: Whatever my fate, I'll go to it laughing…
Author: Herman Melville

Quotes: Have a heart that never hardens, and a temper that never tires, and a touch that never hurts…
Author: Charles Dickens

Quotes: If we wait for the moment when everything, absolutely everything is ready, we shall never begin…
Author: Ivan Turgenev

Quotes: If you've never failed, you've never tried anything new…
Author: Albert Einstein

Quotes: Nothing is lost, nothing is created, everything is transformed…
Author: Antoine Lavoisier

Quotes: Where combination is possible, competition is impossible…
Author: George Stephenson

Quotes: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work…
Author: Thomas A. Edison

Quotes: What you want to ignite in others must first burn inside yourself…
Author: Charlotte Bronte

Quotes: The path to paradise begins in hell…
Author: Dante Alighieri

Quotes: You must be wise, but not too wise…
Author: Alexander Turney Stewart

Quotes: A man enjoys the happiness he feels, a woman the happiness she gives…
Author: Pierre Choderlos de Laclos

Quotes: Half of today is better than all of tomorrow…
Author: Jean de La Fontaine

Quotes: Nobody can give you wiser advice than yourself…
Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

Quotes: He who is brave is free…
Author: Seneca

Quotes: Save when you can and not when you have to…
Author: John D. Rockefeller

Quotes: Worry is the child of fear – if you kill out fear, worry will die for want of nourishment…
Author: William Walker Atkinson

Quotes: Life is a verb, not a noun…
Author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

Quotes: The less said the better…
Author: Jane Austen

Quotes: Do you know what is the hardest thing in life?. To make a choice…
Author: Honore de Balzac

Quotes: You know nothing till you know all;which is the reason we never know any thing…
Author: Herman Melville

Quotes: Nobody is more inferior than those who insist on being equal…
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quotes: When work is a pleasure, life is a joy. When work is duty, life is slavery…
Author: Maxim Gorky

Quotes: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest…
Author: Paul Cezanne

Quotes: If you would seek health, look first to the spine…
Author: Socrates
